alert.note: Alert for Camden; Currituck; Pasquotank; Perquimans (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 2:48PM EDT until June 12 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Camden County in northeastern North Carolina... Pasquotank County in northeastern North Carolina... Central Perquimans County in northeastern North Carolina... Central Currituck County in northeastern North Carolina... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 248 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Morgans Corner to near Chapanoke to near Belvidere, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Elizabeth City around 300 PM EDT. Chapanoke around 310 PM EDT. Camden around 315 PM EDT. Elizabeth City State University around 320 PM EDT. Whitehall Shores around 325 PM EDT. Weeksville, Nixonton, Indiantown, Shiloh and Old Trap around 330 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Bob White Fork, Poplar Branch, Parkville, Glen Cove, Nicanor, Gregory, Pasquotank, Jacocks, Spences Corner and Goose Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
